disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Saturday 4 June to end of Monday 6 June GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: There may be the occasional heavy and thundery shower spreading across all parts. Generally sunny with some cloudy and a slight north easterly air flow.<br/><br/>Currently back trajectories are indicating that the air will have circulated over the North Sea before arrival to the UK so should be relatively 'clean' with little pollution import.<br/><br/>With adequate dispersion of local emissions, air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>

currentForecast.forecastSummary: The forecast for tomorrow is not available yet but should be issued around midday. GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: The forecast for tomorrow is not available yet but should be issued around midday.
